messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fw: children's chat sites
messages.msgSnippet: Hello ladies, My girls are also looking to chat online with someone.  Our eldest daughter will be 14 in less than a month, and our youngest daughter is 81/2.
messages.messageBody:
Hello ladies,

My girls are also looking to chat online with someone. Our eldest
daughter will be 14 in less than a month, and our youngest
daughter is 81/2. They have both chatted a bit on icq, but we can't
find many children online. We have tried mirc, but that hasn't been
terribly successful, although, they do wish to keep trying. I always
sit with them. Perhaps we could arrange a time, and a server
where all of the children could meet. I could set the channel up as
invite only, so only those children who ask permission via this list,
have access to the channel. I have a 12 year old son, who is a
computer whiz, and he could help ensure security.

Colleen

On 6 Apr 00, at 3:54, Debi Lemmons wrote:

Hello
I have a 11 year old daughter who has been looking for e-pals. Email us at
debi_lemmons@...

Thanks

debi
